title: K\"ahler Fermions on the Weitzenb\"ock space-time
abstract: The K\"ahler-Dirac equation is derived on the Weitzenb\"ock space-time, which has a quadruplet of parallel vector fields as the fundamental structure. A consistent system of equations for the K\"ahler fields and parallel vector fields is obtained. Key words: teleparallelism, fermions, internal symmetry, equations.
